name: Blue (itch)
description:
Welcome to my place.

This is the reflection of how I feel.

Some people have a mind palace, I have a mind garden. Here's what I hope it look like.

I started working on blue when it was very difficult to speak to a friend. Somehow, asking the same question through a game made it way more easy.

Since then it has taken a life of his own. From a sad and oppressing game, he became a relaxing experience.

The game may be updated in the futur, if I need too.

The game is probably locked in the night for now.

Music: EVERLOOP by dustyroom
